segments.text: I see the woman standing in a puddle, drying dishes like it's a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just overflowing, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching his limits to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her treat, and it's kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it's making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, no matter the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the water before it causes a real problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, yet everyone seems to be in their own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR
